question: As per a joint statement by FAO, IFAD, ILO and WHO, what fraction of the worldâ€™s workforce is at the risk of losing livelihoods due to Covid-19?
explanation:
As per a joint statement issued by Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO), International Fund for Agricultural Development (IFAD), International Labor Organisation (ILO), World Health Organisation (WHO), nearly half of the global workforce are at risk of losing their livelihoods.
The statement also stated that the number of undernourished people could increase 132 million by the end of this year from the current levels of 690 million.
